title: Portfolio Website
abstract: My portfolio website displays my projects and talks about me and my technical skills. Each project on display has a brief project summary with a link to a detailed breakdown. My portfolio website is designed and developed from scratch. The organization and animations of my portfolio show my ability to structure and style an HTML file with CSS. I use JavaScript to manipulate the HTML and make the website interactive.
skill: Manipulate HTML elements and shadow DOM parts of a page.
Make the framework of the webpages.
Modify the apperance of the webpages and apply animations.
